automata

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • automata.State

  • public class State
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a possible state of a cell. This model is represented by a name (optional) and a color (optional). For example, the two states for the Conway automaton could be: State("Alive", Color.blue); State("Dead", Color.white); If not specified, the default name value is "". If not specified, the default color is a random one.
    See Also:
    Automaton, Cell
